body:
> Immediately a request is sent to the server side.

What kind of request?
It's expected. Do you handle validation request on the server side correctly?
The first validation on the client side. second validation on the server side. But the first does not work, just running second.
What validation rule is applied to email attribute?
This problem still exist in 2.0.12, my client side validation work fine when blur, change input, but sending ajax request when submitting although all required fields are invalid.
@phuczeero should be another problem that is alike. This one was fixed. Please open new issue with details on how to reproduce the issue.

issue.title: enableClientValidation not work on submitting if set enableAjaxValidation to true

labels.name: status:ready for adoption
labels.description: Feel free to implement this issue.

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework
